arcade.agent.helper

Interface Helper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public interface Helper
extends sim.engine.Steppable
    A Helper object is a steppable that interacts with agents.

    Helper objects can be used for:

    • introducing outside perturbations to the cells in the system, such as the adding new cell agents, wounds, or treatment interventions
    • time-delayed cell agent behaviors, such as cell movement, death, and division

    Unlike Cell objects, Helper objects do not represent a physical entity in the model. Instead, they are a generic interface for introducing steppables to the model.
